document.full_text: north sudanese army forces took control of the main town of the disputed abyei region on saturday after fighting with southern forces, both sides said, in further violence ahead of southern secession.
document.title: north sudan takes control key town in abyei
lines_and_colors: north sudanese army forces took control of the main town of the disputed abyei region on saturday after fighting with southern forces, both sides said, in further violence ahead of southern secession.
